body:
Hello, this is o0DarkNinja0o! My 2 Favorite Games are League of Legends and of course..minecraft! When I first joined I loved it and I still do. Even though this is kinda my first time here. I've 1 friend so far(which I hope he accepted on the old website) PeachyYas. He's really friendly and helps everyone! I hope I can make more friends and maybe help the server in some way! Thanks for reading this!

  o0DarkNinja0o (Skype CuteHoovy) ^-^
